title: Rose and rose gardens
creator_contributor_role: KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode of Series "Gardens of the world". Host Audrey Hepburn, leads a glorious adventure with the rose, the world's most popular flower. Starting with the French ideal of a rose garden at La Roseraie de l'Hays les Roses, to the magic of the unsurpassed collection of old roses at Montisfont Abbey in Hampshire, England, the rose claims its rightful place as the ultimate flower of legend, romance and beauty. Special guest appearance by world renown author and rosarian, Graham Stuart Thomas.
related_objects: Series; S01173; Gardens of the world; Active; 1993
